WorkItem.Description: the issue is in adding immolate to the spell priorities.  you can add and save any other spell but as soon as you add and save immolate it seems to go into an infinite loop

Comments.Message: did some more testing it only happens when immolate is the first on spell priority list.  if its not first it runs fine

It actually happens for me when Immolate is second in the spell list.  Here is my priority:
Curse of Doom
Immolate
Conflagrate
Chaos Bolt
Incinerate
I'm having issues regardless of where I add Immolate in the priority queue - first, second, third, fourth, etc...

Just wanted to let you know - this is actually a bigger problem...it happens when I tried to select 'spellstone' for a buff...also when I tried to change my list from head to feet...and again when i tried to go from head to ring 1....i gave up after all that...I even left for work and when i got back- it was still locked up...using 98% of my CPU.  Hope some of this info helps your search...I'm desperate for this to be fixed...Thank You!!

same thing cpu goes to 98% 
then it will lock up
I have uploaded some changes for the next version which *should* (hopefully) fix this problem.
I compiled build 36594 and I am able to both load previous character files whose priority list contained Immolate as well as create a priority list from scratch that contains Immolate.
Excellent - in that case, I will close this ticket as it appears to be fixed now.
